service.name: /psal109.ps
service.query:
SELECT A.CODE , A.NAME , MAX(A.GUBUN_BFYY) AS GUBUN_BFYY , SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT_TOT , 100 AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE_TOT , 100 AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE_TOT , MAX(A.GUBUN_ORIGIN ) AS GUBUN_ORIGIN , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT , 100 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_TOT , 100 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_TOT , (CASE WHEN SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT)-SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT))/SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT)*100 END ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE_TOT , (CASE WHEN SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT)-SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT))/SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT)*100 END ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE_TOT
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT1 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT1 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT1 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT1 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE1 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE1 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE1 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE1
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT2 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT2 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT2 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT2 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT2 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT2 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT2 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT2 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE2 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE2 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE2 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT2 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT2 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT2 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT2 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE2 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE2 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE2 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE2 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE2 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE2
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT3 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT3 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT3 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT3 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT3 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT3 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT3 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT3 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE3 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE3 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE3 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT3 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT3 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT3 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT3 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE3 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE3 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE3 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE3 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE3 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE3
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT4 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT4 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT4 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT4 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT4 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT4 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT4 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT4 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE4 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE4 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE4 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT4 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT4 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT4 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT4 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE4 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE4 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE4 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE4 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE4 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE4
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT5 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT5 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT5 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT5 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT5 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT5 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT5 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT5 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE5 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE5 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE5 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT5 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT5 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT5 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT5 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE5 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE5 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE5 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE5 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE5 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE5
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT6 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT6 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT6 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT6 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT6 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT6 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT6 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT6 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE6 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE6 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE6 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT6 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT6 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT6 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT6 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE6 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE6 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE6 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE6 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE6 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE6
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT7 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT7 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT7 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT7 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT7 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT7 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT7 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT7 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE7 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE7 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE7 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT7 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT7 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT7 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT7 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE7 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE7 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE7 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE7 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE7 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE7
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT8 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT8 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT8 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT8 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT8 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT8 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT8 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT8 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE8 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE8 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE8 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT8 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT8 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT8 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT8 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE8 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE8 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE8 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE8 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE8 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE8
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT9 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT9 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT9 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT9 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT9 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT9 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT9 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT9 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE9 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE9 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE9 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT9 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT9 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT9 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT9 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE9 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE9 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE9 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE9 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE9 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE9
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT10 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT10 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT10 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT10 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT10 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT10 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT10 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT10 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE10 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE10 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE10 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT10 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT10 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT10 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT10 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE10 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE10 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE10 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE10 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE10 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE10
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT11 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT11 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT11 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT11 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT11 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT11 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT11 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT11 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE11 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE11 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE11 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT11 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT11 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT11 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT11 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE11 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE11 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE11 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE11 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE11 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE11
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT12 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT12 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT12 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT12 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT12 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT12 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT12 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT12 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE12 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE12 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE12 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT12 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT12 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT12 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT12 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE12 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE12 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE12 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE12 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE12 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE12 FROM ( SELECT A.PUMBUN_CD AS CODE , C.PUMBUN_NAME AS NAME , A.PLAN_YM , '전년매출' AS GUBUN_BFYY , A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT , A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT , A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT , A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT , A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE , A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE , '당초계획' AS GUBUN_ORIGIN , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE , A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE1
, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE1 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE1
, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE2 , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM,5,2) = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE2

AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.PLAN_YM LIKE ? || '%' AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = A.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = A.PC_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) A
GROUP BY A.CODE , A.NAME ORDER BY A.CODE

SELECT A.CODE , A.NAME , MAX(A.GUBUN_BFYY) AS GUBUN_BFYY , SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT_TOT , 100 AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE_TOT , 100 AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE_TOT , MAX(A.GUBUN_ORIGIN ) AS GUBUN_ORIGIN , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , 100 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_TOT , 100 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_TOT , (CASE WHEN SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT)-SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT))/SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT)*100 END ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE_TOT , (CASE WHEN SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT)-SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT))/SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT)*100 END ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE_TOT
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT1 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT1 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT1 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT1 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE1 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE1 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE1 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE1

AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.PLAN_YM LIKE ? || '%' AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = A.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = A.PC_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) A
GROUP BY A.CODE , A.NAME ORDER BY A.CODE

SELECT A.CODE , A.NAME , MAX(A.GUBUN_BFYY) AS GUBUN_BFYY , SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT_TOT , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT_TOT , 100 AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE_TOT , 100 AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE_TOT , MAX(A.GUBUN_ORIGIN ) AS GUBUN_ORIGIN , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , 100 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_TOT , 100 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_TOT , (CASE WHEN SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT)-SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT))/SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT)*100 END ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE_TOT , (CASE WHEN SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT)-SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT))/SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT)*100 END ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE_TOT
, SUM(A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT1 ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT1 ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT1 ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT1 ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT1 , SUM(A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE1 ) AS BFYY_SALE_CRATE1 , SUM(A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE1 ) AS BFYY_PROF_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE1 , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE1 ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE1
